Reviews.Title: Panasonic still the best camera
Reviews.Author: kenner59
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip with my grandkids and chose it for it's size and it's functions.  I was not disappointed!  The camera takes great photos and videos.  It is small and compact and it lives up to the reliability and quality I have experienced with my previous Panasonic digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with battery
Reviews.Author: Peetah
Reviews.Content: I needed another camera because I broke screen on other one and lost one, so I was down without any camera. For the price this camera works good.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-P5 14.1
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Harbert
Reviews.Content: Camera is exactly as advertised and works very well. Digital instructions are a little wordy, but camera is easy to operate after  some practice.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1-megapixel resolution
4x optical image-stabilized zoom; iA mode
3-inch touch-screen LCD; Smart Touch Screens feature
720 HD video capture; LUMIX Image Uploader makes it simple to share pictures on Facebook and video on YouTube
Capture images and video to  SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP5 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch Touch-Screen LCD (Blue)
